__e: I'm tired of hating people, but I don't know how to stop.
He can't even bring himself to hate the people that hurt him.
I just got so bent outta shape the last couple of days, hating on vampires, but that ain't who I am, it ain't who I wanna be, so I'm gonna make it right.
If we don't tell him he'll keep on hating us and acting as if he wanted us dead.
And you probably hate me, and I don't blame you, but being away from you has made me realize that I never want to be away from you again.
You left me no choice but to hate you, and I hate you for that.
